id.description: Unique identifier of the balance transaction

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'balance_transaction'

amount.description: The transaction amount in the smallest currency unit

created.description: The date and time when the transaction was created

updated.description: The date and time when the transaction was created

credit_note.description: Credit note related to the balance transaction

currency.description: The currency code of the transaction amount

customer.description: ID of the customer associated with the transaction

ending_balance.description: The ending balance after the transaction

invoice.description: ID of the invoice associated with the transaction

livemode.description: Boolean indicating whether the balance transaction is in live mode

metadata.description: Custom metadata attached to the balance transaction

type.description: Type of the balance transaction (e.g., charge, refund, adjustment)
